issue.title: [CI][GLib] Failed to update gcc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11975](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11975). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/2111869686?check_suite_focus=true#step:8:70

```

:: installing mingw-w64-x86_64-gcc (10.2.0-9) breaks dependency 'mingw-w64-x86_64-gcc=10.2.0-8' required by mingw-w64-x86_64-libgccjit
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11975?focusedCommentId=17302826) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9718
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9718>
